text.headline: Bachelor of Engineering in Electrical and Telecommunication Engineering
text.text: Pursued Bachelor of Engineering from Army Institute of Technology, India, specializing in Electrical and Telecommunication Engineering.

text.headline: M.S. in Business Analytics
text.text: Completed a Master of Science in Business Analytics with a concentration in Data Science at The University of Texas at Dallas, TX.

text.headline: Business Operation Associate at ZS Associates
text.text: Managed client relationships and led various client engagements, contributing to significant client profitability and operational excellence.

text.headline: Data Scientist at Colaberry
text.text: Engaged in data collection, analysis, and model development, contributing to strategic business decisions and effective marketing efforts.

text.headline: Assistant Director | Data Scientist at Moodyâ€™s Analytics
text.text: Led customer analysis and personalization initiatives, significantly enhancing customer engagement and satisfaction metrics.

text.headline: Data Science Manager at Wayfair
text.text: Oversaw a team focused on product engagement analytics and experimentation, driving key marketing strategies and product enhancements.

text.headline: Associate Director at Moody's Analytics
text.text: Leading the development of a conversational AI application and guiding teams in advanced data analysis and machine learning techniques.
